products.name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max 512GB
products.description: The pinnacle of mobile technology with a cinematic camera and A18 Pro chip.
products.full_description: Experience the future of mobile with the stunning 6.9-inch ProMotion display and the all-new A18 Pro chip. Its triple-lens camera system delivers unmatched photo and video quality, making every shot a masterpiece.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 1TB
products.description: The ultimate Android flagship with S Pen support and massive zoom.
products.full_description: The S25 Ultra is the ultimate Android powerhouse. It features a new, advanced space zoom system, integrated S Pen for productivity, and a massive battery to power through the day. Built with a durable titanium frame.

products.name: Nothing Phone (3)
products.description: Unique transparent design with glyph interface and smooth performance.
products.full_description: The Nothing Phone (3) continues the brand's unique aesthetic with a refined Glyph Interface. It focuses on a clean Android experience with intuitive AI features and robust mid-range performance.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 7 Classic
products.description: Premium health monitor with rotating bezel and Wear OS.
products.full_description: The Galaxy Watch 7 Classic combines a timeless aesthetic with cutting-edge health technology, including ECG, BIA analysis, and advanced sleep coaching. The signature rotating physical bezel provides intuitive navigation.

products.name: Google Pixel Watch 3
products.description: Sleek design with deep Fitbit integration and Google AI features.
products.full_description: The Pixel Watch 3 is Google's newest wearable, offering a clean, modern design, seamless integration with Android, and deep fitness tracking powered by Fitbit. It's the smart watch for the minimalist.

products.name: Fitbit Charge 7 Fitness Tracker
products.description: Advanced sleep tracking and stress management.
products.full_description: The Charge 7 is a slim, easy-to-use fitness tracker. It provides essential health metrics, including stress management scores, heart rate monitoring, and detailed sleep analysis, all day long.

products.name: Sony Alpha A7 V Full-Frame
products.description: Flagship mirrorless camera for professional photo and video.
products.full_description: The A7 V is a photographer's dream, featuring a new 61MP Exmor R sensor, 8K video recording, and a revolutionary AI-powered autofocus system that tracks subjects with unparalleled speed and accuracy across the frame.

products.name: GoPro HERO 13 Black Action Cam
products.description: Next-level image stabilization and rugged waterproof design.
products.full_description: The HERO 13 Black pushes the boundaries of action camera technology with HyperSmooth 6.0 stabilization and a larger sensor for cinematic video. It's rugged, waterproof, and ready for any adventure.

products.name: Insta360 Ace Pro Action Camera
products.description: AI-powered action camera with massive sensor and flip screen.
products.full_description: The Ace Pro is an AI-powered action camera co-engineered with Leica. Its large sensor captures vivid detail even in low light, and the flip screen allows for easy framing whether shooting forward or backward.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM6 ANC
products.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation and spatial audio support.
products.full_description: The next evolution of noise-canceling headphones. The WH-1000XM6 features improved dual noise-canceling processors, superior audio quality with LDAC support, and plush comfort for all-day listening.

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro (3rd Gen)
products.description: Seamless Apple ecosystem integration with adaptive transparency.
products.full_description: The third generation of AirPods Pro delivers incredible sound quality with personalized spatial audio. They feature MagSafe and USB-C charging, plus double the noise cancellation performance of the previous generation.

products.name: JBL Live 3 Series TWS Earbuds
products.description: True wireless earbuds with a smart charging case display.
products.full_description: The JBL Live 3 Series TWS Earbuds stand out with their smart charging case that features a display for controlling settings and music without touching your phone. They offer great sound and deep bass.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air 13" (M3 Chip)
products.description: The ultimate portable laptop with all-day battery life.
products.full_description: The ultimate portable laptop with the M3 chip, delivering a perfect blend of power and efficiency. The fanless design keeps it silent, and the Liquid Retina display is stunningly bright and colorful.

products.name: Dell XPS 15 (i9, 64GB RAM)
products.description: Premium Windows laptop with InfinityEdge display and high performance.
products.full_description: A powerhouse Windows laptop, the Dell XPS 15 is known for its stunning InfinityEdge OLED display and professional-grade performance. It's the ideal machine for video editing and demanding creative work.

products.name: Acer Chromebook Spin Plus 714
products.description: High-end 2-in-1 Chromebook with all-metal chassis.
products.full_description: This is a high-end 2-in-1 Chromebook built on a sleek all-metal chassis. The Spin Plus 714 offers rapid performance and a sharp touch screen, seamlessly transitioning between laptop and tablet modes.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10+ Tablet
products.description: Premium Android tablet with large screen and S Pen support.
products.full_description: The Galaxy Tab S10+ is Samsung's flagship Android tablet, designed to compete with the iPad Pro. It features a massive screen and comes with the S Pen, making it excellent for drawing and note-taking.

products.name: Apple iPad Pro 13-inch (M4 Chip)
products.description: Thinnest and most powerful iPad yet with Ultra Retina XDR display.
products.full_description: The new iPad Pro is the thinnest device Apple has ever made, featuring the groundbreaking M4 chip. Its tandem OLED Ultra Retina XDR display provides astonishing brightness and precision for creative professionals.

products.name: Amazon Fire Max 11 Tablet
products.description: Affordable 11-inch tablet for media consumption and light tasks.
products.full_description: The Amazon Fire Max 11 is the company's most powerful and largest tablet. It's an affordable option for consuming media, reading, and light gaming, tightly integrated with Amazon's ecosystem.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5 Pro Console
products.description: Next-gen console with enhanced graphics and ray tracing.
products.full_description: The PlayStation 5 Pro delivers the definitive console gaming experience with a dedicated machine learning accelerator, enhanced ray tracing, and a massive 2TB SSD for lightning-fast loading.

products.name: Microsoft Xbox Series X Console
products.description: Powerful console with fast loading and 120 FPS support.
products.full_description: The Xbox Series X is Microsoft's most powerful console, designed for speed and performance. It offers 4K at 120 FPS, quick resume for multiple games, and is the home of Xbox Game Pass.

products.name: Nintendo Switch 2 (Rumored)
products.description: Next-generation hybrid console for gaming on the go or at home.
products.full_description: The anticipated next-generation hybrid console from Nintendo, combining the flexibility of a handheld with the power of a home console, expected to feature enhanced graphics and backward compatibility.

products.name: Logitech G Pro Wireless Mouse
products.description: Ultra-lightweight wireless mouse for professional esports.
products.full_description: Designed for professional esports athletes, the Logitech G Pro Wireless mouse is incredibly lightweight and features the HERO 25K sensor for pixel-precise tracking and ultra-low latency.

products.name: Corsair K100 RGB Keyboard
products.description: Optical-mechanical switches and iCUE control wheel.
products.full_description: The Corsair K100 RGB is a premium mechanical gaming keyboard. It features OPX optical-mechanical key switches and a dedicated iCUE control wheel for fast customization and superior speed.

products.name: Elgato Stream Deck XL
products.description: Advanced control surface for streamers and content creators.
products.full_description: The Stream Deck XL is an advanced control surface for content creators, providing 32 customizable LCD keys to trigger actions, launch media, and switch scenes instantly. Essential for serious streamers.
